survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their satisfaction with subscription-based meal kit services, including quality, convenience, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based meal kit services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based meal kit services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox. The 'Other' option should include a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered by your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is labeled clearly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meals offered by your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: What do you like most about your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What do you like most about your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or family member?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question. Use a single-choice radio button.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or family member?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?
